<Note>
  A beautifully designed portfolio template to showcase your work, experience, and skills. Built with Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS.
</Note>

## Installation

<Tabs defaultValue="cli">
  <TabsList>
    <TabsTrigger value="cli">CLI</TabsTrigger>
    <TabsTrigger value="manual">Manual</TabsTrigger>
  </TabsList>
  <TabsContent value="cli">
    ```bash
    npx create-next-app@latest portfolio --use-pnpm --typescript --tailwind --app
    ```
  </TabsContent>
  <TabsContent value="manual">
    <Steps>
      <Step>Clone the repository</Step>
      ```bash
      git clone https://github.com/codehagen/portfolio-template.git
      ```

      <Step>Install dependencies</Step>
      ```bash
      pnpm install
      ```

      <Step>Start the development server</Step>
      ```bash
      pnpm dev
      ```
    </Steps>
  </TabsContent>
</Tabs>

## Customization

<Steps>
  <Step>Update your information</Step>
  Edit `config/site.ts` to update your personal information, social links, and site metadata.

  <Step>Add your projects</Step>
  Add your projects in `content/projects` using MDX files. Each project can have its own images, tech stack, and description.

  <Step>Customize the theme</Step>
  Modify `styles/globals.css` and `config/theme.ts` to match your personal brand colors and style preferences.
</Steps>

## Deploy

Deploy your portfolio template with one click using Vercel:
